description:
As an Admin
  I want to manage plants via API
  So that I can create, update, and validate plant data programmatically

elements.name: Verify API response when mandatory fields are missing

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I get a valid sub-category ID from the system
I send a POST request to "/api/plants/category/{categoryId}" with incomplete payload
the response status code should be 400
the response should contain validation errors for "quantity" and "price"

elements.name: Verify API response when quantity is negative

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I get a valid sub-category ID from the system
I send a POST request to "/api/plants/category/{categoryId}" with payload
the response status code should be 400
the response should contain validation error for "quantity" with message "Quantity cannot be negative"

elements.name: Verify API response when price is zero

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I get a valid sub-category ID from the system
I send a POST request to "/api/plants/category/{categoryId}" with payload
the response status code should be 400
the response should contain validation error for "price" with message "Price must be greater than 0"

elements.name: Verify API response when User tries to delete a plant

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I am authenticated as a User
I get a valid plant ID from the system
I send a DELETE request to plant endpoint "/api/plants/{plantId}"
the response status code should be 403
the response should contain a "Forbidden" error message

elements.name: Verify successful plant creation by Admin in sub-category

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I get a valid sub-category ID from the system
I send a POST request to "/api/plants/category/{categoryId}" with payload
the response status code should be 201
the plant should be created successfully

name: Admin Plant API Management

description:
As a User
  I want to retrieve plant information via API
  So that I can view plant data programmatically

elements.name: Verify API response when accessing plant list without authentication

steps.name: the API service is running
I send a GET request to "/api/plants" without authentication
the response status code should be 401
the response should contain an "UNAUTHORIZED" error message

elements.name: Verify API response when no plant records exist

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
no plant records exist in the system
I send a GET request to "/api/plants"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain an empty plant list

elements.name: Verify API returns plants sorted by price

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
multiple plant records with different prices exist
I send a GET request to "/api/plants" with query param "sortBy=price&direction=asc"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain plants sorted by price in ascending order

result.error_message:
Error: [2mexpect([22m[31mreceived[39m[2m).[22mtoBeTruthy[2m()[22m

Received: [31mfalse[39m
    at Proxy.<anonymous> (D:\QA Test case\New folder\ITFac_Batch21_Group11\node_modules\playwright\lib\matchers\expect.js:213:24)
    at World.<anonymous> (D:\QA Test case\New folder\ITFac_Batch21_Group11\steps\api\plant_api.steps.js:180:41)

elements.name: Verify User cannot add a plant using API

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
I get a valid sub-category ID from the system
I send a POST request to "/api/plants/category/{categoryId}" with plant data
the response status code should be 403
the response should contain a "FORBIDDEN" error message

elements.name: Verify API supports pagination parameters

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
more than 10 plant records exist
I send a GET request to "/api/plants" with query param "page=1&size=10"
the response status code should be 200
the response should return only 10 plant records

name: User Plant API Management

description:
As an Admin
  I want to manage plants in the system
  So that I can add, edit, and validate plant data

elements.name: Admin should see validation messages when mandatory fields are empty

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
I navigate to the Plant management page
I click on Add Plant button
I click on Save button without entering any data
I should see validation messages under all required fields

elements.name: Admin should see error message when price is zero

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
I navigate to the Plant management page
I click on Add Plant button
I enter "TestPlant" as Plant Name
I select a valid category
I enter "0" as Price
I enter "10" as Quantity
I click on Save button
I should see an error message stating "Price must be greater than 0"

elements.name: Admin should see error message when quantity is negative

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
I navigate to the Plant management page
I click on Add Plant button
I enter "TestPlant" as Plant Name
I select a valid category
I enter "100" as Price
I enter "-1" as Quantity
I click on Save button
I should see an error message stating "Quantity cannot be negative"

elements.name: Admin should see validation error when selecting main category

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
I navigate to the Plant management page
I click on Add Plant button
I enter "TestPlant" as Plant Name
I select a main category
I enter "100" as Price
I enter "10" as Quantity
I click on Save button
I should see a validation error

elements.name: Admin should be able to edit plant details successfully

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
a plant "EditPlant" exists in the system
I navigate to the Plant management page
I click on Edit action for plant "EditPlant"
I change the plant name to "Plant"
I click on Save button
I should see a plant success message
the plant "Plant" should appear in the list

name: Admin Plant Management UI

description:
As a Normal User
  I want to view plants in the system
  So that I can see available plant inventory

elements.name: User should see "Low" badge for plants with quantity less than 5

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
plants exist in the system with quantity less than 5
I navigate to the Plant management page
I should see plants with quantity less than 5 displaying a "Low" badge

elements.name: User should NOT see "Low" badge for plants with quantity 5 or more

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
plants exist in the system with quantity 5 or more
I navigate to the Plant management page
I should NOT see a "Low" badge for plants with quantity 5 or more

elements.name: User should be able to sort plants by name

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
multiple plants exist in the system
I navigate to the Plant management page
I sort plants by "Name"
the plant list should be displayed in alphabetical order

elements.name: User should be able to sort plants by quantity

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
multiple plants exist in the system
I navigate to the Plant management page
I sort plants by "Quantity"

steps.name: the plant list should be ordered by quantity

elements.name: User should see pagination working in plant list

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
more than one page of plants exist in the system
I navigate to the Plant management page
I click on the next page option
I should see the next set of plant records

name: User Plant Management UI
